akn:content.akn:p:
§ 9306. State regulation prohibited A State or political subdivision of a State may not regulate or impose any requirement on pilotage on the Great Lakes. (Pub. L. 98–89, Aug. 26, 1983, 97 Stat. 559.)
Historical and Revision Notes
Revised sectionSource section (U.S. Code)
930646:216g
Section 9306 prohibits State or local regulations of pilotage on the Great Lakes and is part of the exception provided by law envisioned under section 8501(a).
